name: part_004
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ3D】尾丸ポルカ3Dお披露目するか！ポルカおるよ！【ホロライブ】 [GnW76d1A3YQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka attempts a juggling act with clubs as part of her 3D debut.
Omaru Polka transitions to a ball balancing (tama-nori) act and interacts with the audience.

subtitles.original: ジャグリングに挑戦！
subtitles.english: Challenge: Juggling!

subtitles.original: ありがとね、ステッキ君。本当に。
subtitles.english: Thank you, Stick-kun. Truly.

subtitles.original: ステッキ君がいい仕事してくれるんですよ。
subtitles.english: Stick-kun is doing a great job, you see.

subtitles.original: あ、分かった！もうちょっと...
subtitles.english: Ah, I get it! Just a bit more...

subtitles.original: 多分いけるわこれ。分かった、行きます！
subtitles.english: I think I can do this! Alright, here I go!

subtitles.original: もう一回ならいける気がする。
subtitles.english: I feel like I can do it if I try one more time.

subtitles.original: 最後、ラストチャレンジ！いこう！
subtitles.english: The final, last challenge! Let's do this!

subtitles.original: 行くぞ...行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Here I go... Here I go!

subtitles.original: おらっと！おらっぱい！おっしゃい！
subtitles.english: Hah! There! Hah! Yes! Alright!

subtitles.original: あ、いいやん！うまい、うまい、うまい！うまい！
subtitles.english: Ah, looking good! I'm a natural! I'm so good! I'm great!

subtitles.original: え、超上手じゃん！すごい、すごい！え、うまい、うまい！なになに？すごい、すごいうまいうまい！
subtitles.english: Wait, I'm super talented! Wow, wow! Wow, I'm so good! What is this? This is amazing!

subtitles.original: 今のはどうでしたか？判定。
subtitles.english: How was that just now? Give me a rating.

subtitles.original: みんな...あ、だめ？
subtitles.english: Everyone... Ah, it's a fail?

subtitles.original: ああ...何度でも終わらせに掛かる。
subtitles.english: Aah... They're trying to end it no matter what.

subtitles.original: あれ？だめでしたかね？どうでした？
subtitles.english: Huh? Was that no good? How was it?

subtitles.original: え？あ！違います！違いますよ！あの...曲が欲しかったとかそういうわけ...あ。
subtitles.english: Eh? Ah, no! That's not it! I mean... it's not like I wanted background music or anything... Ah.

subtitles.original: カットイン。尾丸ポルカ3Dお披露目
subtitles.english: Cut-in. Omaru Polka 3D Debut!

subtitles.original: はい、というわけで、ここまでので楽しかったという方は、
subtitles.english: Alright then! If you've enjoyed it so far...

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグ尾丸ポルカ3Dで呟いてください！
subtitles.english: ...please tweet with the hashtag #OmaruPolka3D!

subtitles.original: や、どうでしたジャグリング？
subtitles.english: So, how was the juggling?

subtitles.original: どうですか？じゃ、あ、すごい、トレンド入りも乗ってくれてるということで、本当にトレンディーな尾丸ポルカよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: How was it? Oh, wow... I'm even trending! Please continue to support the trendy Omaru Polka!

subtitles.original: さ、ジャグリングできたよね？今のは。あれダメ？怪しい？どっちかな？
subtitles.english: Well, I pulled off the juggling, didn't I? Just now. Was that a fail? Or was it 'sus'? Which one?

subtitles.original: ちょっとダメ判定かなこれ。うーん。
subtitles.english: I guess that counts as a 'fail' rating. Hmm.

subtitles.original: じゃ分かった。分かった、ちょっと待って。提案が一つある。
subtitles.english: Alright, I've got it. I've got it, wait a second. I have a suggestion.

subtitles.original: うちのサーカスへまだあるんだ、道具。
subtitles.english: Our circus still has more props.

subtitles.original: そう、それは...
subtitles.english: Yes, and that would be...

subtitles.original: 玉乗りに挑戦！
subtitles.english: Challenge: Ball Balancing!

subtitles.original: 玉乗り！
subtitles.english: Ball Balancing!

subtitles.original: やはりね、玉に乗ってコロコロコロコロと進むのが、やっぱ分かりやすいでしょみんなにも。
subtitles.english: After all, getting on a ball and rolling around is the easiest thing for everyone to understand.

subtitles.original: 一番分かりやすいじゃん！一番分かりやすいっしょ！
subtitles.english: It's the most straightforward! The easiest to get, right?!

subtitles.original: ということで今日はこの玉を持ってくるわじゃあ。
subtitles.english: So, I'm going to go and get the ball now.

subtitles.original: ちょっと持ってくる。勝手に持ってきていいのかなこれ？運んじゃっていいやつかな？
subtitles.english: I'll be right back with it. I wonder if it's okay for me to just take it? Is it something I'm allowed to carry out?

subtitles.original: ちょっと...玉君...なんて付けよう。玉君...あ、いてくれた、いてくれた。
subtitles.english: Wait... Ball-kun... What should I call him? Ball-kun... Oh, there he is, there he is.

subtitles.original: この...この...今運んでおります。ぐぬう！
subtitles.english: This... This... I'm currently moving it. Hnnngh!

subtitles.original: いや、ちょっと小さいように見えるかもしれないけど、これ遠近...遠近...遠近法で...
subtitles.english: Now, it might look a bit small, but that's just because of perspective... perspective... perspective...

subtitles.original: めっちゃ大きいから。ナイス！これめっちゃ大きいから。
subtitles.english: it's actually really big! Nice! It's super huge.

subtitles.original: これに乗ってコロコロと転ばれば、ちょっとサーカスかなって。どうかな？
subtitles.english: If I get on this and roll around, it'll really feel like a circus. What do you think?

subtitles.original: まあ判断は...あ！ダメだよそのカメラは！
subtitles.english: Well, the verdict is... Ah! Not that camera angle!

subtitles.original: 判断は任せた。乗ったぞ私は玉に。行くぞ！
subtitles.english: I'll leave the verdict to you. I've successfully mounted the ball. Here I go!

subtitles.original: おっしゃ！行くぞ！おっしゃ！
subtitles.english: Alright! Let's go! Alright!

subtitles.original: おれ...よいしょ...あれ、だめだ。なんで？いや...とと...
subtitles.english: There... whoa... hup... wait, it's not working. Why? Whoa... whoa...

subtitles.original: こうやっていくんだよ、こうやって。分かるか？ほら。
subtitles.english: This is how you do it, like this. See? Look.

subtitles.original: 一番...一番分かりやすいちびっ子向け...え？なんで？ちょっと待って、その悲しいカメラの視点やめて！
subtitles.english: The most... the most straightforward thing for kids... Eh? Why? Wait, stop with that pitiful camera angle!

subtitles.original: これ一番分かりやすいでしょ？ほらほら、こうやって...こうやっていくんだよって。こうやって、こうやって。
subtitles.english: This is the easiest to understand, isn't it? Look, look, you go like this... this is how it's done. Like this, like this.

subtitles.original: なんでこんなに疲れてるんだ？うおー！
subtitles.english: Why am I so exhausted? Whoa!

subtitles.original: いける、まだいける。お前と私の絆なら...いけるぞ！
subtitles.english: I can do it, I can still do it. If it's our bond... then we can do this!

subtitles.original: よっしょ。あの、じゃちょっとゆっくりここで...ふう...はは。よっしょ。
subtitles.english: Alright. Um, let's take it slow here... Phew... Haha. Okay.

subtitles.original: 今ね...え？何で怪しいって言ってるの？嘘。
subtitles.english: Right now... Eh? Why are you all saying it's 'sus'? No way.

subtitles.original: ちなみにこの初めて見る人には分かんないと思うけど、この「サス」っていうのはね、怪しいなって言ってるみんな怪しいなって言ってる。
subtitles.english: By the way, for people seeing this for the first time, you might not know, but 'sus' (ayashii) means everyone thinks it's suspicious.

subtitles.original: 怪しくないだろこれ全然。ほら！ほら！
subtitles.english: This isn't suspicious at all! Look! Look!

subtitles.original: え、うまい！やばい！めっちゃ上手くない？どうですか？これ判定お願いします。
subtitles.english: Wow, I'm good! This is crazy! Aren't I super talented? How's this? Please give me a rating.

subtitles.original: え？じー今帰ってきてるんだよ。どうかな？上手くない？ほらほらほらほらほら...
subtitles.english: Eh? I-I'm on my way back now. How about it? Aren't I good? Look, look, look, look, look...

subtitles.original: あ、上手いなこれ。あ、これ片足でもいけ...いけ...いけ...
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm actually good at this. Oh, I can even do this on one leg... I can... I can...

subtitles.original: おう！どういう...どういう...ちょっと...え？だめ全然？だめ？だめかな？上手いでしょちょっとこれ。よっしょ。なかなか。これはさすがに。
subtitles.english: Whoa! What's... what's... wait... Eh? Is it totally no good? No? Is it bad? I'm pretty good at this, though. Alright. Not bad. As expected of me.
